title.rendered: STEDI VW AMAROK LOWER GRILL LIGHT BAR MOUNTING BRACKET – 21.5″ or 31.5″

content.rendered:
2011-2019 Volkswagen Amarok Led Light Bar Grill Mounts.

From $79.99

Please note: Some models in the 2019 year range may not have the factory pre-drilled holes in the impact beam, you may need to drill these yourself.

SUBSTANCE, MEET STYLE.

Beautifully designed specifically to fit Volkswagen Amarok models.  Available in both 21.5 Inch and 31.5 Inch variants to suit our STEDI ST3K Series, bolts to existing provisions in the lower grill. The end result is graceful & robust auxiliary mounting solution for the discerning Amarok owner.

ROBUST, LIGHTWEIGHT & INTELLIGENT  DESIGN.

Constructed from 3mm thick 3 series stainless steel, gusseted in all the right places to ensure maximum rigidity.  Large diameter holes ensure that our bracket remains light weight, while simultaneously ensuring minimal disruption to airflow. Finished in satin UV stable powder coat, and cut to the exacting measurements of our ST2K 21″ & 31″ light bars.

AFTERMARKET YET COHESIVE.

The Amarok represents class leading European styling that can easily be spoiled by fitting lights using universal solutions. The STEDI lower bracket sits proportional to the Amarok’s front end geometry while adding just the right amount of attitude.

DETAILS

UPDATE: Fits 2011 to 2020 Volkswagen Amarok Led Light Bar Mount to suit our ST1K-21.5″ , ST3K-21.5″ and ST3K-31.5″ LED Light Bars.

  • Black Powder Coated Finish
  • 3 Series Stainless Steel
  • Designed to minimise disruption of air-flow
  • No need to remove front bumper
  • Bolts to existing factory bumper supports to pre-existing holes
  • No drilling required, bolt and nut kit included

Price is for bracket only, light bars sold separately.

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL 3 series Stainless Steel
FINISH Powder Coat

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 21.5 or 31.5inch VW Amarok Grill Mounting Bracket
  • 4 x Bolts and Nuts

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI VW AMAROK LOWER GRILL LIGHT BAR MOUNTING BRACKET

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
